Package de.oth.blocklib.world.structures

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.world.structures.Wall
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoorWall, Floor, FullWall, Roof, WindowedWall
public abstract class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
Provides functions for a single wall.
Author:
Chris Ebbinger (WS 2017/2018)

  • Method Details

    • setStart

      public void setStart​(Vector3i start)

    • setEnd

      public void setEnd​(Vector3i end)

    • getOrientation

      public WallOrientation getOrientation()
      Calculates the direction a wall is facing by comparing its length in x or z direction.
      Returns:
      the orientation as WallOrientation or null, if the wall is not 1 block thick.

    • getLength

      public int getLength​(WallOrientation orientation)
      Returns the length of a wall depending on its orientation
      Parameters:
      orientation - The orientation of the wall

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      Calculates the length of a wall. The orientation is calculated automatically.
      Returns:
      The largest of its lengths.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Calculates the height of a wall.
      Returns:
      The height.

    • getWallBlocks

      public java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> getWallBlocks()
      Calculates a map of block data containing all blocks of the wall
      Returns:
      blockIDs mapped to location vectors
